alert.note: Alert for Lafayette; Madison; Taylor (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued July 07 at 5:17PM EDT until July 07 at 6:30PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 630 PM EDT FOR NORTHWESTERN LAFAYETTE...TAYLOR AND SOUTHERN MADISON COUNTIES... At 516 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 17 miles west of Perry, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Perry, Madison, Greenville, Lee, Pinland, Ebb, Buckville, Eridu, Cabbage Grove, Scanlon, Foley, Perry-Foley Airport, Hampton Springs, Sirmans, Shady Grove, Iddo, Moseley Hall, Chancey, Secotan and Boyd. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. To report severe weather contact your nearest law enforcement agency. They will send your report to the National Weather Service office in Tallahassee.
